mapper.insert: replace into tb_merchant_rate (id , merchant_id , channel_id , rate , create_time) values (uuid() , #{merchantId} , #{channelId} , #{rate} , now());
mapper.select: select t1.rate RATE,t2.channel_name CHANNEL_NAME,t1.ID from tb_merchant_rate t1 left join tb_pay_channel t2 on t1.channel_id = t2.id where merchant_id=#{merchantId}
